casebody.data:
John F. HURLEY, Owner of the Boat J. J. Rickert, Libelant-Appellant, v. Tug PUTNAM, Respondent-Appellee, New York Canal & Great Lakes Corporation, Claimant. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. March 5, 1928. No. 195. William P. Purdy, of New York City (Thomas A. McDonald, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Rumsey & Morgan, of New York City (John Tilney Carpenter, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed, with costs.
